description: A vulnerability was found in Dromara ujcms 9.7.5. It has been rated as problematic. Affected by this issue is the function uploadZip/upload of the file /main/java/com/ujcms/cms/ext/web/backendapi/WebFileUploadController.java of the component File Upload. The manipulation leads to cross site scripting. The attack may be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.
